testcase.brief: Set min-password-length, then change password or create user
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: AP with default setting Login AP in default admin user
Test Procedure: 1. Set min-password-length with 10 2. Create a read-write or read-only user with password length less than 10 3. Create a read-write or read-only user with password length equal to 10 or greater than 10 4. Change default user's password with length less than 10 5. Change default user's password with length equal or greater than 10

step.desc: Create a read-write user with password length less than 10
step.log-match: -c -e "ERROR: password length is out of range, please enter ${min_password_length}-32 digitals or letters"

step.desc: Create a read-only user with password length less than 10
step.log-match: -c -e "ERROR: password length is out of range, please enter ${min_password_length}-32 digitals or letters"

step.desc: Create a read-write user with password length equal to 10 or greater than 10
Create a read-only user with password length equal to 10 or greater than 10
4. Change default user's password with length less than 10
step.log-match: -c -e "ERROR: password length is out of range, please enter ${min_password_length}-32 digitals or letters"

step.desc: 5. Change default user's password with length equal or greater than 10
restore password of default user admin
